name: A Sock's Journey
description:
Ever wondered what happened to your sock that seemingly disappeared after a trip to the laundry room?

 In A Sock’s Journey, you play as a sock that has tragically fallen behind the washing machine. As the missing sock, you must journey throughout their house to reunite with their other half, or else they’ll disintegrate into lint! 

Explore the house, help other lost characters, and find the elusive laundry basket to become whole again!
